onboarding_intro_title_1: Travel, Delivery, and Culinary in the Palm of Your Hand
onboarding_intro_description_1: Order an EV Moto for a ride, enjoy your favorite food, and send packages easily, all in one app!
onboarding_intro_title_2: Travel Pollution-Free, Drive More Environmentally Friendly
onboarding_intro_description_2: Eco-friendly travel with EV Moto. No smoke, no noise, just a comfortable, pollution-free ride!
login_description: Enter your mobile number to continue.
tnc_privacy_confirmation_1: By Registering / Logging in, you agree to
verification_otp_description: We have sent a 6 digit OTP to your number
verification_otp_not_match: The code you entered is incorrect
home_ride_ready_to_go_title: Ready to go? Determine your destination
dialog_coachmark_description: Ready to hit the road? EVmoto is ready to make your journey easier, faster, and safer. Let's explore its key features.
coachmark_description_1: Enter your destination location to start ordering EVmoto services.
coachmark_description_2: Save your home or office address to make your next order faster.
coachmark_description_3: Use EVmoto to transport passengers, send packages, or order food.
coachmark_description_4: Your balance is used to pay for services. Tap Top Up to add to your balance and History to view your transactions.
coachmark_description_5: Now you're ready to use EVmoto. Set your destination and start your journey.
no_promotion_description: Don't worry, we're preparing exciting promotions. Stay tuned and check back!
cancel_order_confirmation_title: Why did you cancel your order?
cancel_order_confirmation_description: Please let us know and we can improve
cancel_order_reason_1: I don't need car for the time being due to a change in intinerary
cancel_order_reason_2: In a hurry, I need to change use other means of transportation
cancel_order_reason_3: The vehicle dispatched by the platform is too far
cancel_order_reason_4: The driver didn't come pick me up for various reasons
cancel_order_reason_6: Driver asks for fare increase or transact by cash
name: Name
snackbar_logout_success: Successfully logged out of the account
logout_confirmation: Are you sure you want to log out of your account?
delete_address_confirmation: Are you sure you want to delete the address?
intro_ride_title: Let's Get to Know EV Moto, The Most Inter-Motorized!
intro_ride_description: The agile one ready to take you anywhere! Need to go for a walk, send a package, or order food? EV Moto is always on, pollution-free, and definitely the most reliable! 🚀⚡
intro_food_delivery_description: We're cooking something special for you! Just a moment...our food delivery service will be ready to serve you hot soon! 😋🔥
intro_package_delivery_description: We're preparing a faster, easier, and more environmentally friendly delivery service! Get ready for a hassle-free package delivery experience!
enter_your_destination_location: Enter your destination location to start ordering EVmoto services.
make_sure_the_address_entered_is_correct: Make sure the address entered is correct or select the nearest point that the driver can reach.
prepare_the_exact_amount_of_money: Prepare the exact amount of money for your trip
saved_address_not_found_description: Save the address to make your next order faster.
activity_not_found_description: Do the first activity and see the notes here!
